page.title: 18Fetcham:Computers and Videos
page.content: COMPUTERS:Over the years computers have became more popular,the price more reasonable and so more people are buying them.I made this survey out of twenty-three people.The most popular computer was the ZX Spectrum with six people.Fourteen people have computers. My school has three computers.We've got two BBC'S and a ZX 81. VIDEOS:Out of twenty-three people, fifteen people owned videos.The most popular was VHS.Only one person in my class has a Betamax.Once again I did a survey.Five years ago only two people in my class owned a video,where as two years ago ten people had a video.But this year two people have bought videos.Most videos cost over 300 pounds.
